name: Shapy Road
description:
GET READY, GET SET, DASH!!

Come and have fun for free with this amazing endless runner! Chase after the highscore your friends put on and beat them in the best time waster game. Do you have what it takes to run as long as the top player? It’s not super easy to be the best, but we believe in you! Start running and racing now. It’s time to go for gold!


BECOME THE BEST AMONG YOUR FRIENDS!


DASH TO WIN
Rush over shape shifting platforms and react as fast as possible while you dash through gates of changing shapes and deadly blockers in this awesome time waster game.

PUSH YOUR REACTION TO THE LIMIT
Are you able to react to the transforming color and shape while the speed is increasing permanently? SHAPY ROAD will be the biggest speed test for your brain.

ENDLESS FUN
You are the limit! Chase after the highest scores and longest runs in our endless runner. The only thing that can stop you is your own reaction time.


FEATURES

◈ ENDLESS FUN - With endless running, racing, and shape shifting, the fun never ends!!!
◈ EASY CONTROLS - Swipe to dash!
◈ HARD TO MASTER - Increasing difficulty! Can you beat the rest in this speed test?
◈ COMPETITIVE - Show your friends who's king!
◈ CHALLENGING - Environments and lethal obstacles
◈ PLAY OFFLINE - No wifi connection needed!
◈ PLAY ANYWHERE - At work, in the park, in space…
◈ AWESOME SOUNDTRACK
◈ BEAUTIFUL GRAPHICS
◈ IT’S FREE & FUN


Pick-up this FREE classic arcade runner game and play anytime OFFLINE - NO WIFI NEEDED!

How far can you get?!
LET’S DO THIS!

_____________________________________________

Do you have any Ideas, praises or problems?

Your SHAPY ROAD Team


Please note that SHAPY ROAD is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases. You can play SHAPY ROAD offline but a network connection is required for in-app purchases.
